name: SizeResponsible
description: A behavior for detecting element resize (adapted from https://github.com/sdecima/javascript-detect-element-resize). To be used in conjunction with the _sizeresponsible.scss mixin.

methods.name: addResizeListener
methods.description: Adds a listener to the target element which will respond on resize.

arguements.name: fn
arguements.description: The callback function for elememt resize.

arguements.name: target
arguements.description: The elememt which will respond on resize.

methods.name: removeResizeListener
methods.description: Removes the listener from the target element which will responded on resize.

arguements.name: fn
arguements.description: The callback function for elememt resize.

arguements.name: target
arguements.description: The elememt which will respond on resize.
